message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at a price of $14,000.  I believe this product will be very beneficial to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value, but I'm confident this product offers unique advantages that justify a higher price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I understand that the product has unique advantages, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $11,500?
